Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Khandhasaṃyutta » 1.3 Uparipaṇṇāsaka » 1.3.1 Antavagga
1.3.1.6 Dutiyasamaṇasutta
Khandhasaṃyutta
Uparipaṇṇāsaka
Antavagga
Dutiyasamaṇasutta
108.
668Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Pañcime, bhikkhave, upādānakkhandhā. Katame pañca? Seyyathidaṃ—  rūpupādānakkhandho, vedanupādānakkhandho, saññupādānakkhandho, saṅkhārupādānakkhandho, viññāṇupādānakkhandho. Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti…pe…  pajānanti, sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
669Chaṭṭhaṃ.
